name: TL Auto Feature Image
author: Dragoon APps

sections.description:
A featured image is an important part of a blog post, and it can be tough to choose the right one. This plugin makes it easy to select the first uploaded image as the featured image for your post. You can save time by using this plugin, and you won’t have to worry about choosing the wrong image.

With this plugin, it will automatically set the first uploaded image in a pos as its featured image. This will help you save time and ensure that your posts look great..

You can enable this feature for each post type in Settings > TL Auto Feature Image
sections.installation:
Just a standard installation required.

  1. Upload auto-feature-img.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Auto Feature Image is under Settings > TL Auto Feature Image
  4. Access Settings > TL Auto Feature Image and tick the post types you want to allow this feature

short_description: Automatically set the first uploaded image of a post as the featured image.
